section.p: You are crossing an area of fertile farmland, where much of the food is grown to feed the army. Little farmsteads dot the landscape, and the ploughed fields have the appearance of a patchwork quilt. .

outcomes.outcome: Mistaken for a murderer! Forced to flee into the mountains -

section.p: When you are ready, you can go:

choices.choice: To the Lake of the Sea Dragon
